name: Recipe: Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Dish Effects</color>
Restores <color=#37ffff>8 – 10%</color> of Max HP and an additional <color=#37ffff>800 – 1,200</color> HP to the selected character.
<color=#ffffff>Proficiency</color>
5
<color=#ffffff>Dishes</color>

customize.name: Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce
customize.desc: Grilled Fish doused in a delicious sauce. The fish is scored, stuffed with spices, then baked. Once cooked, a thick mint sauce is generously drizzled over the top. The refreshing aroma of the fish is enough to whet anyone's appetite.

customize.name: Delicious Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce
customize.desc: Grilled Fish doused in a delicious sauce. Crisp, fragrant fish skin, tender fish meat... Ordinary methods, extraordinary flavor.

customize.name: Suspicious Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce
customize.desc: Grilled Fish doused in a delicious sauce. The thick sauce has all but drowned out the fish's natural flavors, and the strident taste of mint has all but wiped that of Grilled Fish out.

customize.name: Cipac
customize.desc: Merchant from the Stadium of the Sacred Flame.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce
customize.desc: Grilled Fish doused in a delicious sauce. The fish is scored, stuffed with spices, then baked. Once cooked, a thick mint sauce is generously drizzled over the top. The refreshing aroma of the fish is enough to whet anyone's appetite.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Mint
customize.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

value.text: Recipe: Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce
Purchase from Cipac at Zakan's Street Bites in Stadium of the Sacred Flame: Chuwen Fair
